mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "purchaseOrder.id", a.material_id AS "materialId", a.factory_id AS "factoryId", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.amount AS "amount", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_purchase_order_detail( order_id, material_id, factory_id, quantity, amount, remarks, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{purchaseOrder.id}, #{materialId}, #{factoryId}, #{quantity}, #{amount}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
